articles.author: Adam Conway
articles.title: One UI 6 Open Beta hands-on: A total system redesign - XDA Developers
articles.description: One UI 6 is here, and we've been playing with it on a Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra.
articles.content:
Key Takeaways
  • One UI 6 brings a revamped user interface with new notifications, quick settings, and a redesigned media player.
  • The settings menu has also been redesigned.
